name: Flaming Wall
effects: Magic fire damage (1.4x, MAG) to all enemies
Reduce resistance to Fire by 20% for 3 turns to all enemies

desc_long: Deals fire damage and reduces fire resistance for all enemies.
對全體敵人發動火屬性攻擊並降低火屬性耐性。
적 전체에 불속성 피해를 주고 불속성 저항력을 감소시킵니다.
